statements: DELETE FROM mergers_and_acquisitions WHERE deal_id = 100 AND deal_name = 'ABC Corp' AND acquirer_company = 'XYZ Inc';
DELETE FROM mergers_and_acquisitions WHERE deal_date < '2021-01-01' AND target_company = 'Company A';
DELETE FROM acquisitions WHERE target_company = 'ABC Inc.';
DELETE FROM acquisitions WHERE target_company = 'ABC Corp' AND announcement_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM deal_advisors WHERE bank_id IN (SELECT bank_id FROM investment_banks WHERE headquarters_location = 'New York');
DELETE FROM MergersAndAcquisitions WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Corp';
DELETE FROM MergersAndAcquisitions WHERE status = 'Pending' AND advisor = 'John Doe';
